mng: copper (chemistry), see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]

exm.mng: bronze implement, refers to ancient bronze artifacts, from c. 2,000 BC
Tongchuan prefecture level city in Shaanxi
bronze medal, bronze plaque bearing a business name or logo etc
Tongren city and prefecture in Guizhou
Tongling prefecture level city and county in Anhui
bronze (alloy of copper 銅|铜 and tin 錫|锡[xi1])
brass (alloy of copper 銅|铜[tong2] and zinc 鋅|锌[xin1])
